title: Square root of 2
summary: The square root of 2 (approximately 1.4142) is a positive real number that, when multiplied by itself, equals the number 2. It may be written in mathematics as 2 {\displaystyle {\sqrt {2}}} or 2 1 / 2 {\displaystyle 2^{1/2}} , and is an algebraic number. Technically, it should be called the principal square root of 2, to distinguish it from the negative number with the same property.
